attributes.action: give the british people a referendum on the flawed e.u. constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as the flawed e.u. constitution was rejected by the french and dutch voters
it seems the dictators in brussels dont
understand the word no so as tony blair
promised the british people a referendum bring it on we brits will show the dictators in brussels what no
means.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
